Heading.title: Enable Magnetic Tilt Compensated heading from IMU

RateOfTurn.title: Enable Calculated Rate of turn from Magnetic heading changes

PitchRoll.title: Enable Kalman Filtered Pitch and Roll measurements

Temp.title: Enable Temprature from the BMP388 on-board module

Barometer.title: Enable Barometric Pressure from the BMP388 on-board module

Altitude.title: Enable Calculated Altitude based on Atmospheric Pressure compensated from known elevation above sea-level

Elevation.title: Known RPi elevation for basis of Altitude calculations (in Meters)
